entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , Halton Hills
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:59 PM EST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 9.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Toronto Pearson Int'l Airport 01:00 AM EST Saturday 31 December 2022
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 9.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.4 kPa falling
Visibility: 8.1 km
Humidity: 100 %
Dewpoint: 9.3°C
Wind: WNW 11 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of rain. Low plus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Fog patches developing near midnight. Amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Rain. High 8.
entry.summary: Rain. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Amount 10 to 15 mm. High 8. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending in the evening then cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h near midnight. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 30 December 2022
